title: Number of vehicles in use worldwide 2006 to 2015
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 2 lines namely Commercial vehicles, and Passenger cars. The y axis represents Number of vehicles in thousand units and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Commercial vehicles, and Passenger cars are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Passenger cars, and lastly, 2. Commercial vehicles.
Overall across the Year, Passenger cars mostly maintained the highest Number of vehicles in thousand units when compared to others with a mean value of 799826.3, and it peaked at 2015.
The botommost line, Commercial vehicles,  has a mean of 289727.9, and peaked at 2015.
yAxis: Number of vehicles in thousand units
